sentences.english: Although you are identical twins, what are your differences?
sentences.chinese: 身爲同卵雙生兒，你們有什麼差別？

sentences.english: You look at identical twins, monozygotic twins who share the same genetic profile.
sentences.chinese: 同卵雙胞胎，他們擁有相同的基因譜。

sentences.english: Identical twins, which are relatively common in man and many animals, are genetic clones.
sentences.chinese: 在人類和很多動物中，同卵雙生都是相對普遍的現象。

sentences.english: Identical twins have inherent features from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 同卵雙胞胎具有來自雙親的固有特徵。

sentences.english: Identical twinning can begin only inside the Fallopian tube.
sentences.chinese: 同卵孿生可能只在輸卵管內開始發育。

sentences.english: Identical twins were no more likely to share the characteristic than non-identical twins.
sentences.chinese: 其中擁有這一特徵的同卵雙胞胎要多於異卵雙胞胎。

sentences.english: Do identical twins have identical synaesthesia?
sentences.chinese: 同卵雙胞胎會有同樣的聯覺嗎？

sentences.english: And you look at those who are reared apart.
sentences.chinese: 研究那些被分開撫養長大的同卵雙胞胎。

sentences.english: And if identical twins are fully human, wouldn't cloned people be as well?
sentences.chinese: 要是同卵雙生是完整的人，那麼，克隆人不也是嗎？

sentences.english: In other words, the two are identical twins; only Dolly is six years younger.
sentences.chinese: 換言之，二者是一對同卵雙胞胎，只是多莉小六歲。

sentences.english: Identical twins are formed in the womb.

definition: heredity/to inherit (a trait)/to pass on (to one's offspring)

pinyin: er4 shi2 yi1 san1 ti3 zong1 he2 zheng4
